name: 12 Week Year Planner Notion Template
description: The 12 Week Year is a powerful time management system that can help you achieve your goals and objectives in a fraction of the time it would normally take. This template is designed to help you plan and execute your 12 Week Year Goals and track your progress along the way.FAQDoes this work on the free version of Notion?Yes. if you don't have a notion account you can create a free account Here Any other questions?You can reach me at notiontony@gmail.com or contact me on twitter @tonydavidz
